TopicTitle: What is the worst mod you have ever tried?

Articles.Content: Also say why it was the worst mod you have ever tried.

I don't think this is a good thread start to begin with. Yes, there are bad mods. But I just don't think pointing fingers and naming names is a good move. It's better to inform the authors of those mods what could be improved, or what you don't like about their mod in particular.

I wouldn't want to put anyone forward for this. It's the result of somebodies hard work. Also the mod I have enjoyed the least is not a bad mod in the slightest. Generally I find the mods I dislike are rarely 'bad'.

i think there are no "bad" mods because for every mod, someone has worked very hard.

there are only mods i personally don't like or don't find useful.

My first experience with MechJeb was absolutely awful. I think there had just been a KSP update or something because that mod did everything wrong. It tried to dive for Kerbin's surface during a Munar transfer. It nose-dived for Minmus' surface when trying to execute a landing maneuver. It spun my ship in circles for over 30 minutes while trying to rendez-vous. Just anything and everything that could go wrong. I was quite peeved.. But, now it works wonderfully.

Not going to name any specifically, but I hate it when the mod-maker just makes a new CFG for a stock part... And does nothing else....

Edit: and, like LostElement, weapons mods....

Edited April 25, 2014 by TechnicalK3rbal

The first mod I made. Because I didn't know what I was doing.

Not going to dis anyone else's mod, because mods can be hard to make and at least they tried.

/thread

Some of my modding attempts are absolutely awful because I always forget something.

But this thread is pretty irrelevant, because even bugs are sometimes fun (looking at you, space kraken )
i got a shrek mod for goat simulator. it wouldnt even load the game crashes when you load the shrek model.

Sorry...

(Could someone close the thread now?)

Was going to move this, but instead I'm closing this to OP's request.

Have a nice day everyone
